Very Short Answer (1M).a: A number that can be expressed in the form p/q, where p and q are integers and q ≠ 0.

Very Short Answer (1M).q: Write an example of an irrational number.

Short Answer (3M).a: Construct a right triangle with legs of length 2 and 1 unit. The hypotenuse will be √5. Use a compass to mark this distance on the number line.

Short Answer (3M).q: Find five rational numbers between 3/5 and 4/5.
Short Answer (3M).a: Convert to equivalent fractions with a larger denominator, e.g., 3/5 = 18/30 and 4/5 = 24/30. Numbers are 19/30, 20/30, 21/30, 22/30, 23/30.
